title: Tests for Audiobooks User Agent Behaviors

tests.section: ยง8.1 Opening and Navigating the Contents of an Audiobook

tests.description: The user agent can open and begin playing an audiobook from the start of the content
The user agent has provided a means to access the reading order to the user
tests.actions: Reading Order is accessible to the user

tests.description: If available, the user agent has provided a means to access the table of contents to the user
tests.actions: Table of Contents is accessible by the user

tests.description: If the audiobook contains a primary entry page, it is displayed first (or the content within is presented first)
tests.actions: Primary Entry Page is displayed first

tests.description: The user agent can play the entirety of an audiobook without user input
tests.actions: Audiobook playback does not require user input

tests.description: The user agent plays the content in the order of the reading order
tests.actions: Audiobook playback is in the reading order by default

tests.description: The user agent can accept user input for audio controls
The user agent provides a method to move between parts of the audiobooks (time increments, chapters, etc.)
tests.actions: Audiobook playback can be navigated through

tests.section: ยง8.3 Audiobook Packaging and Offlining

tests.description: The user agent provides a way to download or offline the audiobook content
tests.actions: User agent provides a method to download the audiobook

tests.description: The user agent can open an audiobook packaged using LPF
tests.actions: User agent can open an LPF audiobook
